data.oai_dc:dc: txt files contain GPS data collected on resident groups during each visit. File name (e.g. AX141208amTIA.txt) returns information on: group identity (AX), date of data collection (141808), whether the visit was in the morning (am) or afternoon, and information on the observer (TIA). Single files contain information on: Latitude and longitude (Position), altitude (Altitude), time of data collection (Description). SB (under Description) returns the location of a sleeping burrow. R codes to merge all files and extract all necessary information are available through the corresponding author.
